oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model 1861 US cartridge box
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: US Model 1861 leather cartridge box with brass US box plate. The box was used by Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood, Co. D, 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA. Atwood was from Fayette, Lafayette County, Wisconsin and he was part of the garrison of Johnsonville, Tenn. Atwood fought at the battle there on Nov. 4, 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
